_sText:
Ze infected sewers v4

- Map Made by:
- DJ-Kagalera (varoxXx96) www.youtube.com/user/varoxXx96 Â¡SUSCRIBE!
____________________________________________________________

special thanks to:
- Kaemon --->Help and tips
- Luffaren----->Particles creator *from the flamethrower*
- LeGrem----->Help and tips
- JorisCeoen----->Minigun model from Paranoid
____________________________________________________________

Version v3
 - Stages added
 - New zones added, map is larger
 - 2 differents boss fights
 - Optimization
 - Added undergroud
 - Added 3 new ways of escape
 - Stucked bugs are fixed
 - Fixed some bugs
 - Spamming message fixed
 - Crazy door fixed (now only close when a zombie will pass it on easy)

Version 4
____________________________________________________________________________________
- Fixed the path of the songs(now the songs sound)
- added a explosion to the chooper of hard
- Easier end on Easy
- Fixed the message on the buker that said zombies on the street
- Fixed the secret of the end of hard
- Fixed the time of reboot of the pushgun
- Added a breakable that dont allow you stay near the door of the elevator for dont get stucked, it breaks when the door is fully open 
- The cave now is bigger and you dont get stucked
